item.title: The AI paradox: How tomorrow’s cutting-edge tools can become dangerous cyber threats (and what to do to prepare)
item.description: AI agents will bring enterprises to the next level, but the same applies to related vulnerabilities. Here are key tips to follow.

item.title: Clever architecture over raw compute: DeepSeek shatters the ‘bigger is better’ approach to AI development
item.description: Chains of smaller, specialized AI agents aren't just more efficient — they will help solve problems in ways we never imagined.

item.title: Sam Altman admits OpenAI was ‘on the wrong side of history’ in open source debate
item.description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman admits the company was "on the wrong side of history" in the open-source debate, signaling a potential strategy shift.

item.title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang meets with Donald Trump on AI
item.description: Nvidia confirmed that its CEO Jensen Huang met with U.S. President Donald Trump to discuss U.S. technology and AI leadership.

item.title: Beyond benchmarks: How DeepSeek-R1 and o1 perform on real-world tasks
item.description: o1 is slightly better at reasoning, but DeepSeek-R1 provides much more details about its reasoning, which is very useful to the user.
